title: /MOMO SlowMo: COTA 2015
description:
MOMO Italy presents a new series of shorts on /DRIVE, featuring high frame rate slow motion footage from Pirelli World Challenge race weekends, all season. What else is there to say? Enjoy the action.

This week it features their race at Circuit of the Americas (COTA) in 2015, in their new Ferrari 458.
tags: Ferrari 458, Circuit of the Americas, Pirelli World Challenge, motorsport
